props.collapseOnScroll: Puts the component into a collapsed state when scrolling.
props.extensionHeight: Designate an explicit height for the `extension` slot.
props.fadeImgOnScroll: When using the **src** prop or `img` slot, will fade the image when scrolling.
props.hideOnScroll: Hides the component when scrolling. Will still show the `extension` slot.
props.invertedScroll: Hides the component when scrolling down and displays it when scrolling up.
props.prominent: Increases the height of the component content to the value of the **prominentHeight** prop.
props.prominentHeight: Designate an explicit height when using the **prominent** prop.
props.scrollOffScreen: Hides the component when scrolling. Will **NOT** show the `extension` slot.
props.shrinkOnScroll: Shrinks a **prominent** toolbar to a **dense** or **short** (default) one when scrolling.
props.collapse: Morphs the component into a collapsed state, reducing its maximum width.
props.image: The `src` used for `v-img`. For additional customization options, use the **image** slot.

slots.extension: Slot positioned directly under the main content of the toolbar. Height of this slot can be set explicitly with the **extension-height** prop.
